column3: Go to the DOAJ admin user search at /account

column4: Every result includes the text "View journals" and "Edit this user" at the bottom
You are taken to the admin journals search, with the user's name specified as an "Owner" filter
The list of journals you expect to be associated with this user are displayed

column3: Click back on your browser window

column4: A new window opens, and you are taken to the edit form for the user
